name: Blast Island Zombies
description:
In Blast Island nothing living there, but zombies, and no one can do the mission except the Captain Gatling, he was named after the Gatling Gun.
Enjoy the jungle and shoot the Zombies while jumping and running
But be carful from the vampire coz he can disappear and suddenly will appear

Lots of coins, jewels
Jetpack to jump high
Share with friends

Have fun and enjoy Free Download
